title: Thunderbird Scrollbar Width  Adjustment on Linux
content: I'm running Thunderbird 128.14 on a Lenovo Z500 IdeaPad laptop with a touch screen, using MX Linux 23.6 with the standard XFCE desktop. Is there a way to increase the scrollbar width for a better fit for my fat fingers? I found a solution for Windows 10, but cannot find one for Linux. Thanks in advance.
